text: Cathrin Bretzeg (born 17 February 1965) is a Norwegian politician for the Conservative Party. In 2004, while the second cabinet Bondevik held office, she was appointed State Secretary in the Ministry of Local Government and Regional Development. She lost this job when the cabinet fell following the 2005 election. She served as a deputy representative to the Norwegian Parliament from Akershus during the term 2005-2009. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy members of the Storting Category:Conservative Party (Norway) politicians Category:Norwegian state secretaries Category:Asker politicians Category:Women members of the Storting Category:Norwegian women state secretaries
title: Cathrin Bretzeg
